title: Enhancing HR Management Practical Competencies: Service-Learning-Based Mathematical Professional Education for Social Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Students can define community issues as mathematical models and propose solutions.
Students can analyze data acquired through service-learning activities and derive statistical conclusions.
Students can write reports that consider ethical considerations and societal impact in project outcomes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
